product.longDescription: Preferred by the Johnny's research team. Flexible, food-grade silicone provides even pressure. Tube-shaped channel for use with support stakes (sold separately). 2.2 mm opening. Choose from three sizes for different stem widths. Pack of 200. Call for bulk sizes.
